# Chamber of Sloth (WondArch)
## Overview
**Chamber of Sloth:** Any creature entering this stronghold space falls under the influence of a *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]* weapons that they can use from outside the chamber.

*Caster Level:* 5th; Prerequisites: [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]**; Market Price:* 7,500 gp.

**Source:** Stronghold Builders Guidebook (WotC), pg. 74
